description: You most likely will never come across a Dream League Soccer FTC file since it is an asset referenced by the game. However, if you want to alter gameplay, such as the jerseys, shoes, and stadium that appear in the game, you will need to modify the FTC files. These files can be found in the following directory of the game installation:
You can use a file manager, such as ES File Manager to navigate to the file location on your Android device.
